sys_app_scan_payload.serialized_record:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_email"><sys_script_email action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><name>!!!scoped_name_1430!!!</name><new_lines_to_html>false</new_lines_to_html><script><![CDATA[(function runMailScript( /* GlideRecord */ current, /* TemplatePrinter */ template,
    /* Optional EmailOutbound */
    email, /* Optional GlideRecord */ email_action,
    /* Optional GlideRecord */
    event) {

    var month = {
        "1": "January",
        "2": "February",
        "3": "March",
        "4": "April",
        "5": "May",
        "6": "June",
        "7": "July",
        "8": "August",
        "9": "September",
        "10": "October",
        "11": "November",
        "12": "December"
    };
    var returnDate = '';

    var rDate = new GlideDateTime(current.return_date);
    returnDate = [month[rDate.getMonthLocalTime()], rDate.getDayOfMonthLocalTime(), ',', rDate.getYearLocalTime()].join(' ');

    template.print(returnDate);

})(current, template, email, email_action, event);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_email</sys_class_name><sys_created_by/><sys_created_on/><sys_id>!!!sys_id_1431!!!</sys_id><sys_mod_count/><sys_name/><sys_package display_value="">!!!app_sys_id!!!</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="">!!!app_sys_id!!!</sys_scope><sys_update_name/><sys_updated_by/><sys_updated_on/></sys_script_email></record_update>
